Internship, Research Aid and PostDoc Opportunities

I am looking for PhD students with expertise in computer science and have interest to do scientific research at the intersection of system and machine learning (MLSYS), or work on AI for Scientific Applications. Please do not hesitate to send me emails at any time if you really want to work with me. You should get my response within 2 business days (usually a few minutes to an hour).

                           
Prototype before polishing. Get it working before you optimize it.
